content: About BetSwirl:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465192.0===== 🌀 The $BETS Token 🌀 =====The $BETS token is BetSwirl's governance and revenue-sharing token.If you hold $BETS, you can stake them on the BetSwirl platform and earn REAL YIELD of Ethereum(ETH), Avalanche(AVAX), Polygon(MATIC), or BNB(BNB) — depending on what blockchain you want to bridge and stake your $BETS!No BS token inflation that acts as "yield" — it's pure fees from players! ===== Current Staking Yield 🤑 =====33% APR on Arbitrum36% APR on Avalanche30% APR on Polygon33% APR on BNB49% APR on the BETS/wstETH LP pair ===== Some Token Info ℹ️ =====Marketcap: around $2.77 millionLittle to no token inflationZero token inflation from staking. You earn pure gas tokens (ETH/AVAX/MATIC/BNB)Liquidity is on Ethereum: Balancer===== Links 🔗 =====Website: https://betswirl.com/)Twitter: https://twitter.com/betswirl)Docs: https://documentation.betswirl.com/)CoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/betswirl/)Discord: https://discord.gg/4BxtJV7fbZ)Dune Analytics: https://dune.com/betswirl/analytics)
